Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Normal
Speaker.line2: It better be something my sister likes.

Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Disappoint
Speaker.line2: This pastry is the one adult would like, not us.

Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Normal
Speaker.line1: But this will still do just fine.

Speaker.name: Nathaniel_Happy
Speaker.line1: It's pastry. And any pastry is better than vegetables anyway!
